body.name: Rael Toner, Miracle Clear Clarifying Toner - Facial Toner for Face, Oily and Acne Prone Skin, with Succinic Acid, Hydrating Vitamin B5, Vegan, Cruelty Free (5.1 oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 36 mins
features: FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN - Specially formulated for oily skin, acne, and large or clogged pores
POWERED BY NATURE - Infused with Succinic Acid to gently exfoliate, Vitamin B5 Panthenol to aid in moisture barrier repair, and Licorice Root Extract to fight inflammation.
REFINES PORES - Skin-mattifying formula absorbs excess oil and controls shine
BOOSTS SKINCARE - Prepares your skin's absorption of additional skincare steps
POWERFULLY GENTLE - Free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, silicones, and artificial fragrance. Non-irritating, non-drying and safe for daily use for all skin types
body.description: Clinically Proven to Clear Breakouts In Just 4 Weeks: Clinically proven to reduce acne by 33.4%*Clinically proven to reduce excess oil & sebum by 42.3%*100% agreed that Miracle Clear Collection is non-irritating**100% agreed skin felt moisturized & hydrated***97% were satisfied with the toner’s performance***97% agreed skin felt soothed***84% saw an improvement in acne inflammation, redness & swelling** **Based on a self-assessment of 32 subjects, aged 20-35, after 4 weeks of Rael’s Miracle Clear 3-step system use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clinically Proven to Clear Breakouts In Just 4 Weeks: Clinically proven to reduce acne by 33.4%*Clinically proven to reduce excess oil & sebum by 42.3%*100% agreed that Miracle Clear Collection is non-irritating**100% agreed skin felt moisturized & hydrated***97% were satisfied with the toner’s performance***97% agreed skin felt soothed***84% saw an improvement in acne inflammation, redness & swelling** **Based on a self-assessment of 32 subjects, aged 20-35, after 4 weeks of Rael’s Miracle Clear 3-step system use.

Balanced & Refined Skin Daily pore-refining toner tightens the look of pores and balances skin for smoother, clearer skin, while prepping skin for additional skincare steps. Clean, Powerful Ingredients Infused with Succinic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, and Vitamin B5 Panthenol to eliminate excess oil & hydrate skin. Sensitive Skin Safe Non-drying toner formulated specially for sensitive, acne-prone skin. Safe for all skin types.

Miracle Clear Exfoliating Cleanser Miracle Clear Clarifying Toner Miracle Clear Barrier Cream Miracle Clear Soothing Spot Gel Miracle Clear Pore Purifying Clay Mask Miracle Patch Invisible Spot Cover Benefit Gently cleanses skin to remove impurities Helps skins texture, and preps skin for additional skincare steps Delivers lasting hydration without leaving skin feeling greasy Targets emerging blemishes and active acne Minimizes the appearance of pores and reduces blackheads For surfaced acne and whiteheads Net Weight/Count 150ml/ 5.1 fl. oz 150ml/ 5.1 fl. oz 53ml/ 8.3 fl. oz 4ml/0.14oz 100ml/3.4oz 96 Count (10mm, 12mm) Key Ingredients Succinic Acid, Minerice Enzyme complex, Wintergreen Extract Succinic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, Vitamin B5 Panthenol Succinic Acid, Minerice Enzyme complex, Vitamin B5 Panthenol Cica Extract, Succinic Acid, Tea Tree Extract Papaya Extract, Jeju Mugwort Extract, Cica Extract Hydrocolloid Dressing Usage Use cleanser as first skincare step After cleansing, use toner to prep skin After toning, use cream to lock in moisture and hydration Apply directly to early stage spots Use during oily Luteal Phase Minimum of 4-8 hours. Can be used overnight. Vegan, Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Artificial Color & Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Safe For All Skiin Types & All Ages ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rael products really work!
reviews.reviewText: Rael products really make a difference on my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works WONDERS for my skincare routine.
reviews.reviewText: This works amazingly during my skincare routine. It performs well against my very oily skin. I also feel as though it helps to prepare my skin for the moisturizer. It is a NEED in my skincare and works wonders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels good and is helping my face's appearance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just bought my second bottle!
reviews.reviewText: I originally was looking for a toner to help my hormonal acne and found this during Prime Day so I decided to try it! After using it for over a month I’ve grown to really like it! I’m not sure if it’s because I’ve been more consistent with my skincare but my acne has gotten a lot better and I truly believe this does a great job. I just bought my second bottle and honestly can’t see myself switching to another toner anytime soon. The price and the quality of the item is what keeps me coming back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Un gran producto, desde el primer momento que me lo aplique mire la gran diferencia en mis poros, definitivamente vale la pena comprarlo, ningún otro producto había hecho lo que está loción está haciendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great clear and noticeable nice skin.
reviews.reviewText: Works great clear and noticeable nice skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not much change
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this toner because it was advertised as an oil-reducing product. I used it a few times after using the cleansing product but it irritated my skin making it red . I didn't see any difference in the oiliness of my skin. Will not purchase this again. Not effective for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work for me
reviews.reviewText: Broke me out more. Didn’t feel like it help clean my skin.
